channel.title: How do I change how much experience an object gives me when I click on it
channel.description: I mean like searching through hay bails or touching magic portals or closing doors. In some server you do that stuff to get experience. How would I change how much exp you get?

item.title: How do I change how much experience an object gives me when I click on it
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Goolo Pure Goolo
item.description:
@Pure_Goolo wrote:

I mean like searching through hay bails or touching magic portals or closing doors.
In some server you do that stuff to get experience.
How would I change how much exp you get?

Read full topic
